page.title: 12S'gate/The green cont'd
page.content: {Arts and Crafts: }Many local societies of Art and Crafts exist here, so people are very keen to develop their talents. Exhibitions are held regularly both indoors and out though Broomfield House cannot be used for this since it was burnt last year. {Landscape:}From Selborne Road you can see right across to the Telecom Tower. The New River flows through the area and a stream called Pymmes Brook. In Ullswater Road the Council want to cut down the plane trees because they think the roots may cause damage to the houses. Some of the residents are fighting to keep them by legal action and we awaiting the outcome.
